items.sentence: Old people have difficulty understanding modern technology.
Will there be any famous musicians performing here tonight?
Tom's family lived in Boston up until the end of last year.
Tom said that he was going to buy something, but he didn't.
There's a good chance that Tom won't ask Mary to the dance.
Tom and Mary have worked together for the last three years.
Tom will be on the first flight to Boston tomorrow morning.
Tom didn't tell us why he wasn't able to be here yesterday.
I should've tried out this electric razor before buying it.
I think a truly perfect person would be very uninteresting.
I'll do that tomorrow unless something unexpected turns up.
What makes you think that Tom would do something like that?
What's something that you don't get tired of talking about?
I was born and raised in a small village not far from here.
French is the only foreign language that I've ever studied.
When I saw Mary the other day, she was wearing a red dress.
How were you able to convince Tom to make you one of those?
Tom said he didn't care who did it, as long as it got done.
Tom was a creative child, but he's not so creative anymore.
I don't think that Tom would be willing to help us do that.
